title: Le Portrait au daguerotype (Les Estrangers à Paris), from Le Charivari
description: man in brown cloak and checked brown pants and left holding a daguerreotype; man at right in blue coat with tan striped pants looks at photograph; little boy wearing blue pants and green jacket at center, seen from back; camera on tripod at left
creditline: Gift of Janet H. Spokes in memory of her parents, Angelica and Ignatius Houley
